properties.entry: SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, COUNT FROM PRODUCT_NOTICE WHERE PRODUCT_NOTICE.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
INSERT INTO PRODUCT_NOTICE ( NOTICE_NO ,NOTICE_TITLE ,NOTICE_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_NNO.NEXTVAL ,? ,? )
UPDATE PRODUCT_NOTICE SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
